company_info.content: We are a technology company focused on providing innovative solutions to help businesses grow and succeed in the digital age.
Our services include web development, mobile app development, AI integration, and digital marketing solutions.
You can reach us at contact@yourcompany.com or call us at +1-555-0123. Our office hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST.

faq.question: What are your business hours?
faq.answer: We are open Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM EST. We also offer 24/7 online support through our website.

faq.question: Do you offer free consultations?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer free 30-minute consultations for all new clients to discuss your project requirements and how we can help.

faq.question: What technologies do you work with?
faq.answer: We work with a wide range of technologies including React, Node.js, Python, AI/ML frameworks, cloud platforms, and mobile development tools.

pricing.content: Our web development packages start from $2,999 for basic websites and go up to $15,000+ for complex enterprise solutions.
Mobile app development starts from $5,999 for simple apps and ranges up to $25,000+ for feature-rich applications.
